archimate:Capability.name: Resource Test Quality Analysis
archimate:Capability.documentation: Resource Test Quality Analysis manages a quality Analysis on Tests to continually tweak and improve it. Resource Test Quality Analysis provides an offline analysis of the usage of the tests to determine its relevance and provide modifications proposal concerning all the Test specification (including: test method, quota, authorized users, consequences according to resultsâ€¦). This analysis is done using statistical test usage data to evaluate the tests relevance and the needed updates. Following the analysis, it can be decided to - Do nothing, - Propose the creation of additional Resource tests, - Propose the update of existing Resource tests, - Remove Resource tests that are considered irrelevant.
